stereosteve

music & code

Just like most other developers, I started learning Ruby with a Rails project.

Many times I have listened to my developer peers describe the elegance and expressiveness of the Ruby language. And they argued these points persuasively.

  • Are these hash keys strings or symbols?
  • Is this a HashWithIndifferentAccess? Because then it wouldn’t matter.
  • Is this a property or a method?

This project is maintained by Steve Smith
